title: I'm waiting for the Voice Chat feature....
body: I'll be waiting n waiting n waiting...{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Are you sure you want a voice chat feature with how toxic league is?
well I sure don't want that, but you know so we can communicate and make kind of strategies. that feature would be so fun and cool, like imagine that..:)
i wish your ideals the best of luck friend.

No reason to put in voice chat when there's a number of voice programs out there.

Those that use it know this.

Those that don't use it will never use an in game voice program.

It's a waste of time and resources creating one and that's why RIOT never will, nor should they.

Yeah I use discord with my friends and that cool.

But sometimes when I am playing alone with random players it would be great if I communicate with them and make a plan to win this match {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}.

If Riot wants to shove team play down our throats so badly then I don't know why the fuck they don't let us have voice chat. Stop acting like the entire community is filled with retards, because in my games there is only 1-2 people being assholes MAX. Just because a few morons would abuse it and have us mute them doesn't mean we should disable it for everyone that isn't an asshole
The last thing I want to hear is some kid crying in VOIP because he's an idiot, but blames the rest of the team.
